13.10.2022 5 minutes read

Jefry Jey

The most destructive and lethal tsunami happened in the Indian Ocean in 2004. The tsunami was the most lethal one in the world, with the death toll reaching a staggering figure of over 230,000… Now let’s fast forward to the reality of 2022 for a moment.

become an ambassador

2601 educational institutions damaged

We wonder whether we can consider the war on the territory of Ukraine a natural disaster, if during the last 7 months, cities and their objects of cultural heritage were wiped off the map and thousands of civilians were killed. We will tell you the facts of the official source of UNESCO, but you make the conclusions … We wonder whether we can consider the war on the territory of Ukraine a natural disaster, if during the last 7 months, cities and their objects of cultural heritage were wiped off the map and thousands of civilians were killed. We will tell you the

Educational establishments

Damage to educational institutions on the territory of Ukraine. 2601 educational institutions suffered from bombing and shelling (i.e. 2292 were damaged, 309 were destroyed) Source: Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine

Project

Our aspiration is to make the world a better place with you on our side!

donate

The main area of our work is to provide people who suffer from serious medical conditions with the rehabilitation they need, to improve the living standards of those people who are currently facing difficult life conditions, and especially to support those ones who suffered from the consequences of Russian aggression.

Jefry Jey Volunteer
